alert.note: Alert for Clark (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 21 at 10:42AM CST until February 21 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 084, 085, 086, 087, AND 088... * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 088 Clark. * WINDS...South 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 13 percent. * IMPACTS...Any ignitions will have the potential to burn out of control quickly, given the ongoing severe drought. Any outdoor burning is strongly discouraged Tuesday afternoon.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
